common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/epis/xspace/create')
request.add_api_parameter("platformName", "OneLink")
request.add_api_parameter("externalSellerId", "109001")
request.add_api_parameter("caseTemplateId", "123302")
request.add_api_parameter("categoryId", "11111")
request.add_api_parameter("subject", "subject")
request.add_api_parameter("description", "description")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerName", "Bambooship")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerEmail", "email@mail.com")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerPhoneNo", "09887878998")
request.add_api_parameter("buyerName", "buyerName")
request.add_api_parameter("buyerEmail", "buyerEmail")
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "trackingNumber")
request.add_api_parameter("orderId", "orderId")
request.add_api_parameter("casePriority", "Normal")
request.add_api_parameter("attachments", "url1,url2")
request.add_api_parameter("attributes", "attributes")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/epis/xspace/create')
request.add_api_param('platformName', 'OneLink')
request.add_api_param('externalSellerId', '109001')
request.add_api_param('caseTemplateId', '123302')
request.add_api_param('categoryId', '11111')
request.add_api_param('subject', 'subject')
request.add_api_param('description', 'description')
request.add_api_param('sellerName', 'Bambooship')
request.add_api_param('sellerEmail', 'email@mail.com')
request.add_api_param('sellerPhoneNo', '09887878998')
request.add_api_param('buyerName', 'buyerName')
request.add_api_param('buyerEmail', 'buyerEmail')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'trackingNumber')
request.add_api_param('orderId', 'orderId')
request.add_api_param('casePriority', 'Normal')
request.add_api_param('attachments', 'url1,url2')
request.add_api_param('attributes', 'attributes')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
